meanings.definition: Taking part in an activity or event.
meanings.sent1: The excited children were participating in the school play.
meanings.sent2: She is a participating member of the local community center.
meanings.sent3: The participating squirrel tried to join the birdwatching group.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the night sky seemed to be participating in a cosmic dance.
meanings.sent5: The participating audience cheered loudly for the performers on stage.

meanings.sent1: The participating students were eager to learn new things.
meanings.sent2: He is a participating member of the neighborhood watch program.
meanings.sent3: The participating cat followed the dog around the house.
meanings.sent4: The participating clouds seemed to be part of a grand painting in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The participating team worked together to achieve their goal.
